```{r results='asis'}

  mutate(colA = ifelse(is.na(colA), "", colA)) %>% 
  gt() %>% 
  fmt_markdown(columns = everything()) %>% 
  tab_options(column_labels.hidden = TRUE) %>% 
  cols_align(align = "left", columns = colB)
```
